attributes.title: Above and beyond - always!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: Where do I even start? I've had the pleasure of working with G2 for the past 2+ years, as I manage the organization's global review site program across 8+ markets. Never have I appreciated a partnership more - the level of attention, strategic support and responsiveness that the G2 team consistently delivers is unmatched. Not only are they always going above and beyond to nurture our partnership, but they never fail to keep our company's goals and strategic priorities at the forefront of their recommendations. Special shout out to Jeremy Levin, Kyle Miller and Megan Miedema - they are an absolute joy to work with and deliver nothing short of a first-class customer experience.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Nothing, honestly. Any (very minor) issues that I've ever had have been promptly addressed, actioned on and resolved by the G2 team in a timely manner.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 provides valuable content for our teams to highlight the voice of the customer via marketing and sales activities. Our sales teams love the intent data, grid reports and customer quotes to aid them in outreach with prospects and current customers. Having a credible third party source to demonstrate how our customers feel about our products and solutions is simply invaluable.

attributes.title: An excellent reviews-and-social proof platform - driving signups and demos for our software!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: What I like best about G2's Marketing Solutions is the dedicated support you get from your Account Manager / Account Executive. They ensure that you get your G2 account set up for maximum impact, and also provide best-practice insights on how to drive authentic, stellar reviews from your customers. Their quarterly reports are also great 'milestones' to plan your review-growth goals by, as they give you something to 'aim for' in your efforts to grow your G2 presence.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Sometimes the internal Admin menu setup is a little confusing to navigate. I guess that this is partially because of how many features/options G2 has, but perhaps this could be laid out a little better. Also, some of the ranking metrics G2 uses to place your company in the rankings for appropriate categories don't always seem to relate to product maturity. I.e. the number of employees in a company. I understand that this can, at times, impact product quality, but at the same time - a large company doesn't an excellent product make!

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: It's helping us to develop, and maintain, a strong presence on G2 as a trusted and high-traffic review/social proof site, driving more good quality leads to our site, in the form of signups and demos.

attributes.title: the project team is always happy to help

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: some options that are available in our plan help us find new leads. Also, the reviews written by our clients add more credibility to the company, especially the badges that we are using on our website and in our promo spaces, in presentations and other ads visuals.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
I do not like that the information about the written and rejected reviews is hidden. There have been several instances where reviews written by our clients have been rejected for no good reason. In case there are controversial issues with the review, it would be better to transparently resolve them directly with the product team.
The market Presence Scoring algorithm is a bit 'blurry'. We can't directly influence this and your position on the G2 grid.
Very long questionnaire, please make it lightweight because it is difficult to get customers to go through all the pages of the questionnaire in order for the review to be qualified for the report.
Also, make screenshot a required field, because it's optional now and clients don't add it, but it's a reason for you to reject the review.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
We are in a highly competitive market, it's important for us to better understand our position in the marketplace of employee intranets and communications.
It's helped drive new leads while providing us with the tools to gain new insights into our visitor audience.
Quarterly reports and badges help us build trust amongst new leads and across different marketing channels.

love.value: Running reviews campaigns is easy, and the account management team is always on top of it and willing to go the extra mile to help us achieve our goals.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The pricing is a bit steep, especially for the intent data. While the data is excellent, there isn't the full functionality in the platform or integrations to make it easy to make the most of it.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 helps us gather social proof from actual customers when case studies are hard to get. The Intent data also helps with our sales prospecting, making sure we're targeting companies that are actually looking to buy.

attributes.title: G2 exceeds all expectations!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
It's amazing how many useful features the G2 platform has. Most of them you can easily use in a few clicks. Well-thought-through and organized information and step-by-step manuals make it easy to navigate the platform by yourself. And tones of case studies and examples shared by the team in comprehensive guides make it easier to navigate through the variety of ways you can use G2.

But the most important is the G2 team working with you. They are professionals that help you to get the maximum from your experience. In some way, it feels like you reinforced your own team with new members who generate ideas of what else could be done to improve your marketing results and even do part of your job (like outreach and so on). Fantastic!

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
Nothing really. 

In the beginning, it's a bit confusing to understand what's exactly included in each plan if you're unfamiliar with the names of the platform's features (as there're many of them). It's not a disadvantage, as your managers will eventually walk you through them. But I would recommend that all who think about using G2 on a pro level invest a bit of their time learning what's in the admin panel to ensure better understanding from the beginning.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Our two main goals were the work on raising brand awareness and increasing social proof. G2 badges and a rating system based on reviews are the perfect tools for both.

attributes.title: Great platform and an even better team!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: Being the largest tech marketplace, it gives a unique opportunity to find the software you require for specific needs, plus the trust that it will measure to expectations thanks to the unbaised and authentic reviews left by real users. On the other side, working with G2 to list our company within their different categories, build trust in the community and showcase our unique product has been a very rewarding experience. Their team is always on top of everything and is ready to help in anything that might come up.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Nothing so far, we are currently developing our project, and everyone has been very responsive. Even when, from our side, there have been some doubts about how to leverage our presence, the G2 team has been there in every step to demonstrate the value and how we can profit from it.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: We are in the process of launching our product internationally; G2 is helping us to touch ground in different regions and build trust within the international community. Thanks to various action plans, trainings, reviews, marketing assets, etc., we are able to 1. engage with our current community and clients while building our reviews and, in the process, learn what has been benefiting them from working with us and what we need to improve, 2. raise awareness of who we are, what we have to offer and our value in such a big audience, 3. differentiate ourselves from our competition and how our offer might be better depending on specific needs and 4. boosting confidence that we are a professional and dedicated company working to improve HR all over the world.

attributes.title: Excellent support and care from the G2 team

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
For me as good as the platform is for helping us showcase our product, it's the wrap-around support and care that really helps G2 to shine. Our account team are super supportive and the monthly call really allows us to get the most out of the platform. 

For the platform itself, most things are super simple and intuitive which makes getting to grips with it quick and easy.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Beyond a few minor UI tweaks here and there (which are quite subjective) there isn't anything really I'd use the word dislike for. It's be great to be able to have a bit of a trial of some of the more advanced features looked away behind a license upgrade.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
G2 is really helping us in two key areas: brand familiarity and lead gen. 

As a relatively new entrant to an ever-growing market, G2 allows people who are looking for a solution like us, to learn about us. Even if we're not a top-of-mind solution (yet), we get included in a lot more conversations than we perhaps otherwise would.

attributes.user_name: Verified User in Information Technology and Services

attributes.title: An insightful platform with great support

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
The peer-review-led aspect of how G2 ranks solutions helps to provide a greater validity to our software and its offering.  Despite needing a large upfront payment, it tends to prove more cost-effective in the long term than some of the biddable PPC directories, where you ultimately end up driving up the PPC every month but the number of clicks and leads remain the same.

Our account and customer success managers, Austin and Michael, have both been great in helping us to optimise our profile and get the most out of our G2 package.

Also, really like the new profile sections in the software categories, with the addition of extra data and ratings info.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
Price increase for renewal was quite a jump in 2022, which wasn't ideal.

Gathering reviews can be difficult due to the need for customers to have to log into G2 in order for them to be validated.  Obviously we understand the need to ensure reviews are genuine and of high quality, but we do get regular push-back from our customers who are willing to leave a review, but have abandoned their review or just won't complete one due to the login requirement and length of the questionnaire.  The screenshot aspect in particular has proved an annoyance for many.

It's a shame badges awarded to software providers are not displayed alongside each providers profile on the software category list.  It'd be a great addition to add extra kudos to profiles.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 has helped us to better understand our position in the marketplace of employee intranets and communications.  It's helped drive new leads while providing us with the tools to gain a greater insight into our visitor audience.  G2 has provided us with invaluable data on how our customers rate our service and solution, which has proved extremely helpful in conversations with prospective customers comparing us to the competition, and is helping to improve the development roadmap of our product.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
Besides being a great platform to build credibility and trust for a brand, G2 also offers quarterly reports that our team are yet to discover (but very much looking forward).

The best thing about G2 though is their team's amazing customer support and service. Our customer support manager Michael Lydon is not only incredibly quick to respond with valuable advice and guidance regarding our questions, but also proactive in reaching out to us himself offering new ideas and support on how we can leverage the customer review collection process and build our profile in the most effective way. Always friendly and available for a chat, Michael sets a standard for customer service across other platforms that we engage with.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
Sometimes reviews (especially video reviews) take longer than expected to get past moderation and become public. 

The platform offers a lot of marketing and promotion opportunities, which is great but can be overwhelming at times. This requires the necessary level of platform understanding to define priorities as well as additional resources (for a startup of our size and stage) from our team to allocate to the platform, which is often hard to find or specifically dedicate to.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: As a startup in a highly competitive market, it's important for us to credibly prove our innovative approach and other differentiators via our client reviews on G2. Together with quarterly reports and badges, it helps us build trust amongst new leads and across different marketing channels.

attributes.review_source: G2 Gives Campaign. This reviewer was offered a donation to a charitable cause in their name as thanks for completing this review.

attributes.title: Super great tool!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 is a great system QBank work with frequently within sales, marketing and soon support. Great support, do always have good tips on how to work even better with generating leads etc.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Nothing I dislike about the system. It is pretty advanced and sometimes hard to understand how to maximize, but I'm always learning new things from G2 and how I can improve my work in the system.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: It is an easy way for me to find warm leads, it also opens my eyes up to companies I did not know about. G2 also provides content for us to share with customers/partners/prospects etc.

attributes.title: Lead generation mixed with all the goodies

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The top 3 things about G2 Marketing Solutions are the leads it brings directly from the platform, the intent data we can couple with native advertising software, and the badges/reports we can use in our marketing campaigns. This tool is optimal for someone who likes to automate processes as it is easy to integrate with other software. G2 also has a fantastic customer success team that helps you get the most out of your experience and the resources you pay for.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Nothing so far, it's easy to use, and it has brought us concrete results.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: It's bringing us demo requests and building trust among our international community.
